about_the_game:
Plot and worldview

In the dark world where demons rule, a group of warriors who fight against the dark forces stand up, bring a beam of justice to mankind, and open an unprecedented adventure.
Your hero needs to constantly challenge a variety of different levels, step by step into the heart of the devil, clear all kinds of demons and ghosts, restore the peace of the human world.

World map


There are 6 chapters in the game, each chapter contains 8 levels, and the events encountered in each level have a different experience, the monsters encountered, the treasure chest obtained, the unknown trap encountered, the new altar Buff bonus, the new dropped equipment and so on are unknown.

CHARACTERS

The character can wear 9 different parts of the equipment, equipment contains 5 qualities: white equipment, blue equipment, gold equipment, dark gold equipment, legendary equipment.
Characters have 13 primary attributes and 19 secondary attributes, full of rich gameplay and experience.
Heroes also have dozens of skills to learn

Equipment

In the game, equipment is a very important and rich gameplay.
Quality: Includes 5 qualities: White equipment, blue equipment, gold equipment, dark gold equipment, legendary equipment.
[White equipment] is more common and low quality, but under the magic of the blacksmith master, you can easily convert the equipment into dark gold quality with a novice hammer, combat effectiveness and demonic properties will be greatly improved, and it is also a very good choice.
[Blue equipment] Compared with white equipment will have more magic properties, combat effectiveness is also greatly improved, and it plays a very important transition role in the upgrade stage. There will also be some attributes that the more advanced equipment does not have.
[Golden equipment] A more advanced quality, and then after the blacksmith master's heart grinding, you can obtain higher combat effectiveness.
[Dark gold equipment] Compared to gold equipment, has more combat attributes, in the battle to get dark gold equipment, can be used directly, usually without more forging is already a good equipment.
Legendary equipment: Legendary equipment that has survived thousands of battles of the ancestors, this quality is born with higher combat attributes.
[Jewelry] Jewelry also contains different qualities, higher quality can obtain higher combat output, jewelry can also be polished by various methods such as washing, extraction, synthesis, etc., to obtain higher combat performance.

Parts: According to the role can be divided into helmets, clothes, gloves, leg warmers, necklaces, rings, weapons, shields, wings.
Weapons: A character can wear a two-handed weapon or a one-handed weapon, and a second-in-command can hold a weapon or shield with a one-handed weapon.
Equipment level: Each equipment has a level, the character level needs to be higher than the equipment level to wear, of course, if the equipment is set with degraded jewelry can also be worn.

Difficulty level

There are four difficulty levels in the game: Normal, Nightmare, Hell, and Purgatory. Players need to reach a certain level in order to move to the next difficulty.

Monsters, equipment drops, traps, altars, etc. appear randomly in all levels of the game, and the battle after reloading the map is also a completely different experience. The bonus properties of the hero's equipment will affect the random events you encounter in the game, such as dropped equipment, gold, traps, monsters, etc., will change; There are hundreds of achievements, DIY to create super God equipment, black market and exchange, hero strategy to team up and so on are greatly enriched the game play.

Quest

The game designed a rich and interesting main task, according to the completion of the task to promote the development of the plot, when the completion of a main task, will get rich material rewards.
Of course, in addition to the main mission, the game also adds a variety of side missions, making the game experience more colorful, and can get a lot of rewards.

Equipment building


Facing different demons, it is best to have different equipment, at this time you can come to the forge to see, let the blacksmith master according to your needs to create different equipment:
Fortification: After the equipment is strengthened, it is easy to improve the combat effectiveness of the equipment.
Composition: Equipment can also be synthesized to create other different equipment, which can be added in more details by the blacksmith master.
Inlay: If the equipment is inlaid with jewelry of different attributes, the performance of the equipment can be greatly improved and the combat effectiveness can be improved.
Engraved: Equipment can be engraved, the main feature is to make a certain performance of the equipment greatly improved, but other attributes will be reduced, break the balance, according to the needs of the player and have a special use.
Synthetic formula: The game has a rich variety of synthetic gameplay, including inscription, equipment building, jewelry and other nearly 40 kinds of gameplay.

Achievements

The game contains more than 100 achievements waiting for players to unlock, after obtaining achievements can also get rich material rewards.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Dark Daemon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-4570 or AMD FX8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX960
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a fantasy themed RPG game. In a dark world, players need to constantly improve their combat power and strategically challenge various monsters and monsters, embarking on an unprecedented adventure journey
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Korean, French, German, Turkish, Vietnamese
